sourcesContent:
import React, {Component} from 'react'; import CharOptions from './CharOptions' class CharStatus extends Component{ constructor(){ super(); this.state = { str: "", con: "", pow: "", dex: "", app: "", siz: "", int: "", edu: "", hp: "", mp: "", san: "", idea: "", luck: "", knowledge: "" } } getStatus = (n, m, l) => { let sum = 0; for (let i = 1; i <= n; i++) { sum += Math.floor(Math.random() * m) + 1; } sum += l; return sum; } getAllStatus = () => { this.setState({ str: this.getStatus(3, 6, 0), con: this.getStatus(3, 6, 0), pow: this.getStatus(3, 6, 0), dex: this.getStatus(3, 6, 0), app: this.getStatus(3, 6, 0), siz: this.getStatus(2, 6, 6), int: this.getStatus(2, 6, 6), edu: this.getStatus(3, 6, 3), }, () => { this.updateCalculatedStatus(); }) } updateCalculatedStatus = () => { this.setState({ hp: Math.ceil((this.state.con+this.state.siz)/2), mp: this.state.pow, san: this.state.pow*5, idea: this.state.int*5, luck: this.state.pow*5, knowledge: this.state.edu*5 }) } sanityCheck = (e) => { console.log(e.target.value); } updateStatus = (e, statusValue) => { this.setState({ }) } render(){ return(
STR CON POW DEX APP SIZ INT EDU HP MP 初期SAN アイデア 幸運 知識
能力値
その他増加分
一時的増加
) } } export default CharStatus;
